titleStmt.title: Englands appeal from the private cabal at White-hall to the great council of the nation, the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled. By a true lover of his country
titleStmt.author: True lover of his country.
Lisola, François Paul, baron de, 1613-1674, attributed name.
Trevor, John, Sir, 1626-1672, attributed name.
Coventry, William, Sir, 1628?-1686, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sir William Coventry. Also attributed to Baron de Lisola (Wing), Peter du Moulin (Brit. Mus. Cat.), and John Trevor (Roger Coke, in Detection of ye four last reigns .. 1694).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
